item.title: PLS HELP!Donator Area!@
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

You can make a portal to your donator area:

First pair of X’s and Y’s are where ur portal is located, 2nd are where it teles you to

if (objectID == 2473 && objectX == XXXX && objectY == YYYY) { if(donator == 1) { triggerTele(XXXX, YYYY, 0); } else if (donator == 0) { sM("You need to be a Donator to enter this portal! Visit to forums to find out how!"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: PLS HELP!Donator Area!@
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

Public Int Donator

Paste this anywhere then change it to:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“dz1”)&& playerDonator == 1){ //Voule Command Generator & Donator Credit to Mercifies
teleportToX = 3278;
teleportToY = 3388;
sendMessage(“Thank You 4 Donating!Donate 15$ To Get To Donator Zone Lvl2!”);

}[/code]
Tell me if it works. I don’t really know if it would or not I don’t have a donator section

item.title: PLS HELP!Donator Area!@
item.dc:creator: @aurisdj aurisdj
item.description:
@aurisdj wrote:

Umm…I Need Help On Donator Teleport… It Allows Any Staff To Teleport To Donator Zone, But I Only Want Donators And How I Do Donator Crown/Sign So It Shows The $ Sign If They Donated Pls Help!
Donator Zone Teleport Code:

if(command.startsWith(“dz1”)&& playerRights >= 1){ //Voule Command Generator
teleportToX = 3278;
teleportToY = 3388;
sendMessage(“Thank You 4 Donating!Donate 15$ To Get To Donator Zone Lvl2!”);

}

Wow,I Use Voule Command Generator Big Deal…It’s Faster To Make Commands…
